item.title: By: Fiona
item.dc:creator: Fiona
item.description: <p>Matthew, sounds like you've got a good deal again. Surely convertible is exactly what you need for Oz anyway. Sun is shining here today, although there's an inch of frost too! Really enjoying your travelog by the way, keep writing.</p>
item.content:encoded: Matthew, sounds like you’ve got a good deal again. Surely convertible is exactly what you need for Oz anyway. Sun is shining here today, although there’s an inch of frost too! Really enjoying your travelog by the way, keep writing.
